sourceID.description: The ID of the data source responding to the query.

sourceName.description: The name of the data source responding to the query.

sourceOwner.description: The publisher/manager/owner of the data source responding to the query.

ownerEmail.description: The email address of the owner of the data source responding to the query.

sourceURL.description: The URL of the data source responding to the query.

recordCount.description: The number of records returned by the data source.

recordRange.description: The range of records returned by the data source. Ranged response is used when obfuscation is required.

min.description: The minimum threshold of the record range.

max.description: The maximum threshold of the record range.

exist.description: Whether there are any records within the source that should match with the query.

resultDetails.description: Additional details about the query result.

subjects.description: The records that match the query, from the database directly.
